title: Gob47

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Purge**(self): Remove all afflictions from yourself. Your *Defense* will increase if there is no ailing effects on yourself.
- **Study**: Find out everyone a player has visited.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are roleblock immune.
- Non-attacking roles visiting you will increase your defense
- Immune to haunts and conversions

desc:
Post 3461
*A dark wizard quickly recognizing behavioral patterns...*
*Your target peers into the unknown. They must be Gob47!*
